name: infra.deploy_stack
description: Deploy a static stack to a host. Resolves stack name to /opt/{stack} and runs docker compose pull && up -d.

host.description: SSH host target (e.g. user@hostname or an SSH config alias).

stack.description: Repo/stack name. Resolves to /opt/{stack} on the host.

services.description: Specific services to deploy. If null or empty, all services are targeted.

pull_only.description: Only pull images, don't start services.

errors.description: ssh binary not found in PATH.
SSH connection or remote command execution failed.

side_effects: Pulls Docker images and optionally starts containers on the remote host via SSH.
version_notes: v1 replaces infra.deploy_compose with convention-based stack naming.
